definitions.title: vb. Hiph. denom.
definitions.body: start, rise, early (prop. load backs of beasts for day’s journey);—Pf.  3 ms. consec. [[וְהִשְׁכִּים]] 2Sa 15:2, Job 1:5, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיַּשְׁכֵּם]] Ge 19:27 +, 2 ms. [[תְּשְׁכִּים]] Ju Jdg 9:33, etc.; Imv. [[הַשְׁכֵּם]] Ex 8:16 +; Inf. abs. [[הַשְׁכֵּם]] Je 7:25 +, [[כֵּים]]- Je 44:4, Pr 27:14, erron. [[אַשְׁכֵּים]] Je 25:3 (Ges:§ 53 K); Pt. [[מַשְׁכִּים]] Ho 6:4 +, etc.,—rise early, make an early start, of journey (Hex only JE); [[לְדַרְכְּכֶם]] Ju Jdg 19:9 (+ [[מָחָר]]), cf. Ct So 7:13; + vb. of going Ge 19:2 (J), standing 2Sa 15:2 (cf. Dr), encamping Ju Jdg 7:1, etc.; + inf. 1Sa 15:12 (cf. Dr), 1Sa 29:11, 2Ki 6:15 ([[לָקוּם]]), [[מַשְׁכִּימֵי קוּם]] Ps 127:3 (opp. [[מְאַחֲרֵי שֶׁבֶת]]); usu. c.[[בַּבּׂקֶר]] Ge 19:27 (J; [[אֶל־הַמָּקוֹם]]), 1Sa 29:10, 1Sa 29:10 + 27 t., + (hyperbol.) [[שֵׁכָר]] ´[[מַשְׁכִּימֵי בַבּ]]: [[יִרְדָּׂפוּ]] Is 5:11 (‖[[מְאַחֲרֵי בֵנֶּשֶׁף ]]); c. [[מִמָּחֳרָת]] Ex 32:6 (E), Ju Jdg 6:28 + 3 t.; c. [[בַּעֲלוֹת הַשַּׁחַר]] Jos 6:15 (J), 1Sa 19:26; [[וַיְמַהֲרוּ וַיַּשְׁכִּימוּ וַיֵּחְאוּ]] Jos 8:14 (J) they made a quick and early start; and went out; † Inf. abs. (Ges:§ 113 s) as adv. [[וְהַעֲרֵב]] ´[[הַשׁ]]: 1Sa 17:16 at early morning and at evening; esp. of ´[[י]]:, in Je: ´[[הַשׁ]]: [[וְדַבֵּר]] = speaking early and often Je 7:13, Je 35:14 and (of Je) Je 25:3, cf. Je 11:7, Je 32:33; oft. [[וְשָׁלוֹחַ]] ´[[הַשׁ]]: = sending early and often Je 7:25, Je 24:4, Je 26:5, Je 29:19, Je 35:14, Je 44:4, also 2Ch 36:15; so vb. fin. [[הִשְׁכִּימוּ הִשְׁחִיתוּ]], Zep 3:7 = with eagerness they corrupted (Ges:§ 120 g); pt. [[הׂלֵח]] ´[[כַּטַּל מַשְׁ]]: Ho 6:4 l1 Ke the dew departing early, Ho 13:3 (Ges:ib.).—1Sa 9:26 read [[וַיִּשְׁכַּב]], v. [[שׁכב]] p. 1011
